docs.title: Heavens Above – Documentation
docs.text: This documentation site is built with MkDocs and deployed via GitHub Actions.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
• Static site located under heavens-above/public.
  • CI and code review run linters and security analysis on pushes and PRs.
  • Scheduled job creates a simple backup log artifact nightly.
  • Dependabot monitors npm dependencies.

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: The main site is deployed from heavens-above/public to GitHub Pages.
